title: Wind Project Financial Model
description: A financial analyst needs to create a detailed financial model to assess the profitability of a proposed onshore wind farm.

tasks.description: Input project parameters: CAPEX, OPEX, capacity factor, expected PPA price, and debt financing terms.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly populates the financial model with the provided inputs.

tasks.description: Calculate the project's Levelized Cost of Energy (LCOE), Net Present Value (NPV), and Internal Rate of Return (IRR).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent computes the key financial metrics accurately.

tasks.description: Run a sensitivity analysis by varying the PPA price and capacity factor by +/- 10%.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a table showing the impact of key variables on IRR and NPV.
